reviewText: I enjoyed "Ice-Blues" on "here-tv" many months ago, not long after "On the Other Hand Death." Why one is on DVD already, whereas the other is not, is a surprise. I hope they release Ice Blues soon, to add to my Donald Strachey collection.
Title: Ice Blues [Region 4]

reviewText: I can't wait for "Ice Blues" to come out. I have all the Donald Strachey Mysteries and they are all great.I e-mailed Here! TV to see if they could tell me when it will be released... Following is the response they sent me..."Thank you very much for your interest in here! We are so glad that you are enjoying our programming and hope that you continue to do so. To find out about purchasing DVD's please visit us at [...] To learn about when a program is scheduled to be released please check on amazon.com or other retailers. Not all titles will have scheduled release dates as of now so be sure to check for updates.  We appreciate your continued support and value your opinion.  Please let us know if you have any additional questions.here! Networks"In other words they aren't telling.  I don't understand why it's taking so long to release.
summary: ICE BLUES, a Donald Strachey mystery
Title: Ice Blues [Region 4]

reviewText: I love Chad Allen in this.  I have watched it several times and it is great.  Received it on time and in excellent condition.
Title: Ice Blues [Region 4]

reviewText: Continuing a "Third Man Out" line, brave detective underwent a string of mortally-dangerous encounters to secure surprising three million dollar donation his partner-a social worker was miraculously given a humanistic youth program to run.It is a good movie if even not embedding same gender affairs issues, of which emphasising a social/professional "normality" of gay professionals is the most.
Title: Ice Blues [Region 4]

reviewText: I've seen the trailer for "Ice Blues" on the DVD for "On The Other Hand, Death". Judging from the trailer, it looks like another terrific Donald Strachey mystery.When will this movie be available on USA format? Please don't deny us fans of more Strachey!
summary: When will this be available for the US?
Title: Ice Blues [Region 4]
